Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 72nd overall pick, by Baltimore in 1980...
Injured on 6/4/1982 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Released by Baltimore on 2/5/1984...
Drafted in 4th round, 75th overall pick, by Texas in 1987...
Injured on 8/6/1989 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 2 weeks...
Traded from Texas to Cleveland on 1/31/1990 (Going to TEX: 2B G. Hubbard. Going to CLE: P E. Vande Berg, C J. Orton)...
Injured on 4/29/1993 with a Bruised Wrist, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/7/1994, off Jeff Tabaka (TEX)...
Injured on 4/18/1995 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...
